framework.objects

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
      • framework.objects.CanvasObject
        • framework.objects.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable

    public class Text
extends CanvasObject
    The Class Text displays text on a given position, with a certain color and font.
    Author:
    Hans Ferchland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Text(int xPos, int yPos, String text)
      Instantiates a new text with position and text.
      Text(int xPos, int yPos, String text, Font font, Color color)
      Instantiates a new text with a given position, text, font and color.
